txt.en: 'The Corsairs are digging within the large cave beneath Emyn Ernil. I am not sure if they are searching for ore or more of the crystals found within the cave. Either way, any raw materials they can use to make further weapons and armour is only a bad thing for us.\n\n'Defeat the miners within the cave to put a hold on their operations.'
Corsair miners are digging for ore and crystals within the large cave under Emyn Ernil.
'The miners have been eliminated, putting any digging operations on hold.'
Emyn Ernil Cave - Mining with Oars
Corsair miners are digging in the large cave beneath Emyn Ernil.\n\nLhossil asked you to defeat the Corsair miners digging beneath Emyn Ernil.
Lhossil can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nLhossil will be very pleased to hear the Corsair miners have been defeated.
